channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 00:51 Alarm lifted in Kirovohrad region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 00:51 Alarm lifted in Kirovohrad region. Follow further messages. #Kirovohrad_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 00:37 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Myriv territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
item.description: 游리 00:37 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region.
